en:
This game has some effect and flash lights

Be careful if you are play this...

PRESS [Z] OR [ENTER] TO CONTINUE
zh_CN:
此游戏含有一些比较亮的特效和闪光

游玩过程中请务必小心

按 [Z] 或 [ENTER] 键继续

en:
--- Instruction --- 

[Z or ENTER] – Confirm
[X or SHIFT] – Cancel
[C or CTRL] - Menu (In-game)
[F4] – Fullscreen
[Hold ESC] – Quit
When HP is 0, you lose.
zh_CN:
--- 游戏教学 ---

[Z 或 ENTER] – 确认
[X 或 SHIFT] – 取消
[C 或 CTRL] – 菜单(游戏内)
[F4] – 全屏
[长按ESC] – 退出
当HP为0的时候，你就输了
